title: Video Copilot - Action movie essentials Pheriodic
description:
What is Action Movie Essentials?
Action Movie Essentials is a generous collection of pre-keyed special effects elements that can be incorporated into any video program and used much like clip art. These elements include: Muzzle flashes, explosions, blood bursts, bullet holes, ricochets, fog banks and much more. This collection gives you the ability to incorporate dangerous live action effects from the comfort of your workstation. We broke laws so you don't have to.



Specifications:
Frame Size: 800x600
Frame Rate: 30 fps (most applications allow you to change this as needed)
Format: QuickTime Movie & PNG Images
________________________________________________

What do you have in it?
-Blood bursts
-Blood splatters
-bullet holes
-Explosions
-Fog
-Muzzle flashes
-Ricochets
-Smoke
-1 tutorial as example what you can do with action movie essential.

________________________________________________

It's is Virus free and i am uploading it for 1 week!

Before downloading the file look at http://www.videocopilot.net/action.html - too see what you are downloading and to get a introduction to the software.
